```{r}
library(jsonlite)

json <- readLines("Data/raw_results.json")

# add missing comma after }
n <- length(json)
json[-n] <- gsub("^}$", "},", json[-n])

# add brakets at the beginning and end
json <- c("[", json, "]")

table <- fromJSON(json)

colnames(table)

table$`Bukkit/Bukkit`

table_flatten <- flatten(table)

colnames(table_flatten)
```
